titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to use available amount to make grants to qualified ship repair yard to pay 75 percent of the cost of acquiring advanced ship repair technology and modern ship repair technology.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to make grants to qualified ship repair yards to pay 75 percent of the cost of acquiring advanced and modern ship repair technology. Authorizes appropriations.
